content: Well it’s quite funny and real. A Call To Action can appear rude and pushy, but it sure gets a reaction be from the reader based on how it’s done. I love leaving comments especially when there are no forced barriers, such as signing in and leavIng a name and contact, oh and also having comments reviewed before posting. While I understand why someone may opt for these options, I’m not willing to do it. 😉 Now a CTA in my opinion works depending on a lot of variables. With an article, we might want feedback and recommending to see how our audience related to the topic. So asking that actionable question should stoke a response Quite similar to you asking me to check out an article I would probably have bypassed. I liked it a lot , but by now you’ve figured out what I did not like. You sure are awesome 😎🌺
